definition: A round fruit with red or green skin and crisp flesh.
A long curved fruit with a thick yellow skin and soft sweet flesh.
A round juicy citrus fruit with a tough bright reddish-yellow rind.
A domesticated carnivorous mammal that typically has a long snout and an acute sense of smell.
A small domesticated carnivorous mammal with soft fur, a short snout, and retractile claws.
The star around which the earth orbits.
The natural satellite of the earth, visible (chiefly at night) by reflected light from the sun.
A fixed luminous point in the night sky that is a large, remote incandescent body like the sun.
A woody perennial plant, typically having a single stem or trunk growing to a considerable height.
The seed-bearing part of a plant, consisting of reproductive organs that are typically surrounded by a brightly colored corolla.
